entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
